      • indexSearch

        public java.lang.String indexSearch(@Context
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           java.lang.String query,
                           java.lang.String sortBy,
                           int limit,
                           int offset)
                             throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException,
                                    DotSecurityException,
                                    DotDataException,
                                    org.codehaus.jettison.json.JSONException
        performs a call to APILocator.getContentletAPI().searchIndex() with the specified parameters. Example call using curl: curl -XGET http://localhost:8080/api/content/indexsearch/+structurename:webpagecontent/sortby/modDate/limit/20/offset/0
        Parameters:
        request - request object
        query - lucene query
        sortBy - field to sortby
        limit - how many results return
        offset - how many results skip
        Returns:
        json array of objects. each object with inode and identifier
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
        DotSecurityException
        DotDataException
        org.codehaus.jettison.json.JSONException

      • indexCount

        public java.lang.String indexCount(@Context
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          java.lang.String query)
                            throws DotDataException,
                                   DotSecurityException
        Performs a call to APILocator.getContentletAPI().indexCount() using the specified parameters. Example call using curl: curl -XGET http://localhost:8080/api/content/indexcount/+structurename:webpagecontent
        Parameters:
        request - request obejct
        query - lucene query to count on
        Returns:
        a string with the count
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotSecurityException
